post.body: I didn't, but that really is fun and exciting. Do you know if he might want to come out fro drinks and curry on Thursday?
It's such a great track. Have you heard the N.A.S.A stuff?
Oh, and McD's when I was 16. The hardest work ever for £2.60 p/h. I'm sure I don't need to explain why it was so cack.
Coucil, processing Housing apps for £7.52 p/h. Thoroughly depressing, and they expected too much from me for the cash. You?
Thanks, obviously didn't want to disappoint you!
Saw this and thought of you. http://tinyurl.com/7e5hlx
http://is.gd/e0gB
The same happened over here, and now the mid range sub-£10 wines are using them. The stigma is changing.
No, that's just the way it is now. Even the French are moving to screw top. I actually prefer it now.
Retweeting @jamespenycate: tastemaker stuff: http://tinyurl.com/8v6e6v
I want to go and see the Thermals in February. Anyone else fancy it? Anyone hook me up with some guesty? TYVM.
The band I'm in that exists in my mind are better than Sonic Youth. Rad.
Having a wild time to "In Utero" AKA the angriest album of all time.
"Moderate rock."
"I'm on, warm milk, and laxatives. Cherry flavoured antiacids..."
"Test meat! Doll steak!"
Are... Is.... whatever
The combination of my Mac, my internet connection, and my mobile phone are proper getting on my tits today.
Making my first post on a Movable Type site. This is scary/exciting/fun. My hair is also shorter.
OK, dilemma. I'm having my hair cut in an hour, yet my hair is like crap from yesterday. Do I wash it, or wear a hat and let them do it?
